title: Mocha and tutti frutti cream horns
description: Show off some serious pastry-making skills with Paul Hollywood's cream horn recipe. For this recipe you will need 12 cream horn moulds, a piping bag fitted with a star nozzle and a piping bag fitted with a plan nozzle.
ingredients: 150g/5½oz strong white bread flour, chilled, plus extra for dusting
2 large free-range eggs, plus extra for glazing
75g/2½oz candied peel, chopped, plus extra for decoration
